resources.string:
This app helps you calculate how much money you need to set aside each day to reach your financial goal. Just set your target amount and the time frame, and Budgetin Aja will tell you how much you should save daily to hit that goal right on time. Super handy for tracking your savings progress in a simple way.

This application is developed for Assessment 1 in the Mobile Programming 1 course. 

Copyright © 2025–2026 Fathan Abdul Aziz. All rights reserved.
Budgetin Aja shows you how much you need to save or earn per day to hit your money goal—whether it’s just for today, this week, the month, or the whole year.
Name: %1$s Selected Range: %2$s Duration: %3$s Target money: Rp %4$s Money/day: %5$s
